content:
Hi everyone!

Advent of Code 2021 is starting soon. If you want to participate or follow along, check out #advent-of-code (2021) and #advent-of-code-spoilers (2021). :holiday_tree:

You can discuss and share your solutions, tricks and tips with other participants there. The stream is not exclusive to Julia, plenty of people participate in other languages as well. A popular Julia community leaderboard can be joined using 213962-a8828aa0 as invite code.

For anyone new to Zulip, please use spoiler tags when posting solutions or spoilery tips and tricks in this stream:

There's a spoilery tip in here:
```spoiler
Code blocks are supported in spoilers:
```julia
hello(name) = "Hello, $(name)!"
```
so are REPL blocks:
```julia-repl
julia> hello("World")
"Hello, World!"
```

If you are new to Julia or Advent of Code, check out @Jasmine Hughes's JuliaCon talk for a summary of the event and some tips on how to approach it: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=336gAu7PAlI
